sources.name: index.ts
sources.content:
export * from "./data-list.style"
export type {
  DataListDescriptionProps,
  DataListItemProps,
  DataListRootProps,
  DataListTermProps,
} from "./data-list"
export {
  DataListDescription,
  DataListItem,
  DataListPropsContext,
  DataListRoot,
  DataListTerm,
  useDataListPropsContext,
} from "./data-list"
export * as DataList from "./namespace"

sources.name: namespace.ts
sources.content:
export {
  DataListDescription as Description,
  DataListItem as Item,
  DataListPropsContext as PropsContext,
  DataListRoot as Root,
  DataListTerm as Term,
  useDataListPropsContext as usePropsContext,
} from "./data-list"
export type {
  DataListDescriptionProps as DescriptionProps,
  DataListItemProps as ItemProps,
  DataListRootProps as RootProps,
  DataListTermProps as TermProps,
} from "./data-list"
